events.content: Anyone want to come over for dinner Saturday?
My boyfriend's house has a yard so we could do a BBQ there instead!
Sounds good! Is that David's place?
Yeah David's place on Oak St. We've been together about 6 months now

metadata.description: Group chat where Sarah mentions her boyfriend David and their relationship duration
metadata.notes: Tests: DATING relationship extraction, third-party entity (David), temporal context (6 months), group chat multi-entity
